column1: 422112,Integration Aide,,"Establish rules or policies governing student behaviour
column3: Advise students on academic or career matters

column13: Tutor students who need extra assistance
column29: Set up classroom materials or equipment

column33: Assist students with special educational needs
column37: Develop strategies or programs for students with accessibility needs
column41: Maintain inventories of materials, equipment or products
column47: Monitor student behaviour, social development or health
column51: Collaborate with other teaching professionals to develop educational programs
